data.title: Happy birthday Hermann Hesse. Born today, July 2nd 1877. A German-Swiss poet, novelist and painter, he won the Nobel prize for literature...
data.meta_description:
10 likes, 0 comments - emmamillslondon on July 2, 2024: "Happy birthday Hermann Hesse. Born today, July 2nd 1877. 

A German-Swiss poet, novelist and painter, he won the Nobel prize for literature in 1946 for his work exploring the intersection of eastern philosophy, meaning, the individual and society. 

Here are one or two books you might enjoy from him, inspired by the Hermann Hesse quotes pictured.

Siddhartha

Steppenwolf ( yes, like the band!) 

The Glass Bead Game

Klingsors Last Summer ( 3 x short stories ) 

Do you like Hermann Hesse too, let me know your favourite books or quotes below in the comments 

Emma x

#HermannHesse #HermanHessequotes #LondonMeditation #EmmaMillsLondon
#meditationquotes #spiritualquotes #treequotes #nonduality #mindfulnessquotes".
